attributes.action: Stop the Abolishion of the current Patient and Public Involvement Forums (PPI)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To date the Forums have achieved a great deal have close working relationships with their Local NHS Trusts. Why fix something that is not broken? why re invent the wheel?. I was privileged to go to the first ever PPI conference and Patricia Hewitt's words where "The ppi forums are here to stay" that was 2 years ago and now what? They are messing up what is valued and perhaps loosing people who are the ones who REALLY care about the NHS. and who REALLY want to make things better for the patient.
